comprehensive_overview: Cell Ranger DNA is a software package from 10x Genomics that enables the analysis of single-cell DNA sequencing data. It is specifically designed to process single-cell data from linked-read sequencing technologies, such as the 10x Genomics Chromium platform, to identify structural variants, copy number variations, and clonality in individual cells.
core_features: Analysis of single-cell DNA sequencing data
Estimation of clonality in individual cells
